member.name: M:RestSharpHelper.OAuth1.IOAuthAuthentifierClient.Authorize(System.Func{System.String,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{System.String}})
member.summary: Authorize the user account. If the implicit operation fails, the function extractVerifier will be called: it will received a link for the user to register and should return the corresponding TokenSecret. If the function returns null the operation will be cancelled.
member.param: A function receiving a link where user can allow the application to use its account and returning the Token secret in case of success, null otherwise.
